name: presidentially
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to, belongs to, or is done by a president : presidentially appointed The commission has five presidentially appointed members, who serve six-year terms. During his period in office, the state experienced nine presidentially declared disasters.
approving in a way that is suitable for a president or expected of a president : If he is wise, he will rise presidentially above the argument, and not become involved. I felt that he actually came across very presidentially.
